sentence: Cawthorn won't have a clear path through the May primary, though, as state Sen. Chuck Edwards and Michele Woodhouse, who leads the GOP in the old 11th District (which is barely any different from this new seat) each made it clear they're staying in.
title: Morning Digest: Join us for our liveblog tonight as the 2022 primaries get underway in Texas
